Detail of Activity / Test - JMF reference in here
Minimum Test Frequency (Lot = 1 day’s production) - Before Works commence
Inspection / Test method - Confirm requirements are followed
Acceptance Criteria - JMF Validated in accordance with NZTA M/27:2020
Record documents (QCP - Quality Control Portal) - Mix Design Report
Project Specific Notes / Instructions - JMF expiry date and validation details in here. And to make sure the mix design is sent to Engineer's Representative for approval prior to paving on site.
Detail of Activity / Test - Weather suitable, Site extents marked, surface suitable for paving (Depths/milling/cleanup complete etc), Environmental Controls in place
Minimum Test Frequency (Lot = 1 day’s production) - Before Works commence
Inspection / Test method - Confirm requirements are followed
Acceptance Criteria - Weather conditions and Site is suitable for paving
Record documents (QCP - Quality Control Portal) - Site Diary
Detail of Activity / Test - Previous layer checked for suitability to achieve Specified Ride
Minimum Test Frequency (Lot = 1 day’s production) - Before Works commence
Inspection / Test method - Confirm Specified Ride requirements can be met
Acceptance Criteria - Site is suitable for paving;

○ The surface to be paved on must have a smooth longitudinal profile, and where a layer of Asphalt is to be placed over a previously constructed pavement layer, the ride quality must be confirmed with the observation of a holdpoint in the previous layer ITP.
Record documents (QCP - Quality Control Portal) - NASSRA Report
Detail of Activity / Test - Communication with affected parties
Minimum Test Frequency (Lot = 1 day’s production) - Minimum of 7 days Before Works commence
Acceptance Criteria - Notify RC at least 7 days before surfacing is programmed
Record documents (QCP - Quality Control Portal) - Communication
Project Specific Notes / Instructions - only required where existing traffic loops are present
Detail of Activity / Test - Paving Plan to be completed
Minimum Test Frequency (Lot = 1 day’s production) - Before Works commence
Inspection / Test method - NZTA M27: 2020 Clause 9.5.1
Acceptance Criteria - Paving Plan to be completed for each shift with dimensions, location and type of (hot/cold) joints, areas and tonneages
